price: 18 Allah seul connaît les mystères des cieux et de la terre et Il voit parfaitement ce que vous faites.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu ghayba al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā taʿmalūna
